TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBarButton extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 工具栏按钮。

span.span: Represents a Windows toolbar button.

summary.span: 尽管 替换并扩展了早期版本的 控件，但也可以选择保留 以备向后兼容性和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件是 控件的父级。 controls are parented by controls. 创建工具栏按钮后要设置的通用属性是 和 。Common properties to set once the toolbar button has been created are and . 设置按钮的 "" 属性，以在图像的下方或右侧显示文本。Set the property of the button to display text beneath or to the right of the image. 若要通过创建 将图像分配给按钮，请将其分配给工具栏的 属性;然后，将图像索引值分配给按钮的 属性。To assign images to the buttons by creating an , assigning it to the property of the toolbar; then assign the image index value to the property of the button. 若要更改分配给工具栏的工具栏按钮的外观，请设置父 toolbar 控件的 属性。To change the appearance of the toolbar buttons assigned to the toolbar, set the property of the parent toolbar control. `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` 外观为按钮提供平面外观。The `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` appearance gives the buttons a flat appearance. 当鼠标指针移到按钮上时，其外观将变为三维。As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional. 当按钮具有平面外观时，按钮分隔符显示为线条，而不是按钮之间的空格。Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the buttons have a flat appearance. 如果 属性设置为 `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`，则按钮显示为凸起和三维，分隔符显示为按钮之间的间隔。If the property is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the buttons appear raised and three-dimensional, and the separators appear as a gap between the buttons. 如果 属性设置为 `ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`，则可以将 分配给某个按钮。You can assign a to a button if the property is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`. 单击该按钮时，将显示分配的菜单。When the button is clicked, the assigned menu is displayed. 若要创建要在 上显示的 控件的集合，请使用 属性的 方法逐个添加按钮。To create a collection of controls to display on a , add the buttons individually by using the method of the property. 或者，您可以使用 方法添加多个工具栏按钮。Alternatively, you can add several toolbar buttons using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 和三个 控件。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具栏按钮将分配给按钮集合，集合将分配给工具栏，并将工具栏添加到窗体中。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 在工具栏的 事件上，将计算 的 属性并打开相应的对话框。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此代码要求 、、和 均已创建。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have all been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新创建的 没有分配给它的默认 或 。A newly created has no default or assigned to it. 按钮的默认样式为 `ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`。The button's default style is `ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 和三个 控件，将按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码要求已创建 、、 和 ，并且 至少分配了一个 。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 新创建的 未分配 。The newly created has no assigned to it. 按钮的默认样式为 。The button's default style is . `text` 参数将分配给 属性，并显示在 "新建" 工具栏按钮控件上。The `text` parameter is assigned to the property and is displayed on the new toolbar button control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 和三个 控件，将按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码要求已创建 、、 和 ，并且 至少分配了一个 。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 "`false`" 时，不能单击工具栏按钮，按钮的外观也会改变。When the property is set to `false`, the toolbar button cannot be clicked, and the button's appearance changes. 分配给按钮的 和 显示为灰色。如果图像或文本有多种颜色，它们将显示为单色灰色。The and assigned to the button appear grayed out. If the image or text has multiple colors, they display in a monochromatic gray.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示切换式工具栏按钮是否为部分按下状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a toggle-style toolbar button is partially pushed.

value.span: 如果切换式工具栏按钮为部分按下状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a toggle-style toolbar button is partially pushed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `true`时，工具栏按钮将显示为灰色。When is set to `true`, the toolbar button appears to have its face grayed. 当 属性设置为 `false` 时，此外观不同于灰显外观，因为部分推送外观推移为整个按钮表面。This appearance is different from the dimmed appearance when the property is set to `false` since the partial-push appearance gives a haze to the entire button face. 除非将 设置为 `ToggleButton`，否则此属性无效。This property has no effect unless the is set to `ToggleButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `RichTextBox1`的 控件的窗体中。在窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeToolBar` 方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`.Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `true`时，工具栏按钮将显示为相对于其他按钮的凹陷或内陷。When is set to `true`, the toolbar button appears sunken or inset relative to the other buttons. 除非将 设置为 `ToggleButton`，否则此属性无效。This property has no effect unless the is set to `ToggleButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `RichTextBox1`的 控件的窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`. 在窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeToolBar` 方法。Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按钮 设置为 则可以指定在按下下拉按钮时要显示的 。If the button is set to you can specify a to be displayed when the drop-down button is pressed. 如果样式设置为 "`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`"，工具栏按钮将显示为按钮分隔符而不是按钮。If the style is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`, the toolbar button appears as a button separator and not as a button. `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton` 样式使工具栏按钮像切换按钮一样操作;它可以处于打开或关闭状态。The `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton` style causes the toolbar button to act like a toggle button; it can be in an on or off state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 和三个 控件，将按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码要求已创建 、、 和 ，并且 至少分配了一个 。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索或分配当前与工具栏按钮关联的数据。Retrieves or assigns the data currently associated with the toolbar button. 任何 派生类型都可以分配给此属性。Any derived type can be assigned to this property. 如果通过 Windows 窗体设计器设置此属性，则只能分配文本。If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、和 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `RichTextBox1`的 控件的窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`. 在窗体的构造函数或 `Load` 方法中调用 `InitializeToolBar` 方法。Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. span.span: The text displayed on the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，Text 属性值为空字符串（""），除非已使用接受文本字符串作为参数的 构造函数创建了控件。The default the Text property value is an empty string ("") unless you created the control with the constructor that accepts the text string as a parameter. 工具栏按钮上的文本方向由按钮的父 的 属性确定，该属性可设置为 枚举值之一。The orientation of the text on the toolbar button is determined by the property of the button's parent , which can be set to one of the enumeration values. 方向与分配给按钮的图像相关。The orientation is in relation to the image assigned to the button. 如果没有为按钮指定任何图像，则工具栏按钮表面上的某个图像将留有空间。If no image is assigned to the button, there will be space left for one on the surface of the toolbar button. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 和三个 控件，将按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码要求已创建 、、 和 ，并且 至少分配了一个 。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置显示为该按钮的工具提示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears as a ToolTip for the button.

value.span: 当鼠标指针在工具栏按钮上移动时所显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed when the mouse pointer moves over the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在鼠标指针移到按钮上时启用工具提示文本的显示，请将该按钮的父 的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To enable the display of the ToolTip text when the mouse pointer is moved over the button, set the property of the button's parent to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 和三个 控件，将按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码要求已创建 、、 和 ，并且 至少分配了一个 。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个字符串，该字符串包含 和 属性的类型和值。The method returns a string that includes the type and the value of the and properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏按钮是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar button is visible.

value.span: 如果工具栏按钮是可见的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbar button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果看不到工具栏按钮，则它不会显示在工具栏上，因此无法接收用户输入。If the toolbar button is not visible, it will not be displayed on the toolbar, and therefore cannot receive user input.
